name: tailerplate
description: "Very simple boilerplate for Tailwind Css including script for Purge and minify using postcss"

scripts.init: npx tailwind init --full && npx tailwind build src/input.css -o public/css/style.css
scripts.build: purgecss --css public/css/style.css --content public/*.html -o src && postcss src/style.css > public/css/style.min.css && echo " Sukses! "

author: virkill
